body.raw:
{
    "is_being_prepared": {{isprepared}},
    "redirect_url": "{{redirecturl}}",
    "required_attachments": 
    [

        {
            "name": "{{attachmentneeded}}"
        }

    ],
"disable_initials": true,
"disable_attachments": false,
"disable_text_signatures": true,
"disable_checkbox": true,
"disable_text": true,
"disable_date": true,
"disable_emails": true,
"disable_upload_signatures": true,
"disable_forward": true,
"disable_decline": true,
"subject": "{{emailsubject}}",
"message": "{{emailmessage}}",
"who": "o",
"send_reminders": true,
"show_options": true,
"signers": 
    [
        {
        "email": "user@example.com",
        "first_name": "",
        "last_name": "",
        "full_name": "",
        "needs_to_sign": true,
        "approve_only": false,
        "auto_approval": false,
        "notify_only": false,
        "in_person": false,
        "order": 0,
        "language": "en",
        "force_language": true,
        "cancelled": true,
        "redirect_url": "{{redirecturl}}",
        /*

            }
        ],
        */
        "password": "{{srpassword}}",
        "email_otp": false,
        "signer_message": "string"
        }
    ],
    "document": "{{signature_url}}/api/v1/documents/{{doc_uuid}}/"
}
